overview: Sweethearts celebrates summertime with open air sex and naughty outside adventures! The cover-girls are having a date at the fair and slip away to "cool off" at the lake, while Tessa and Charlotte have ice-cream before the real licking starts. Nikita and Lucy are going hardcore with their guys in an open field, and the other girls Tara, Vanessa, Terry, and Sandra are enjoying nature all alone.
title: Summertime 11
